description: Good for a quick breaky or lunch or dinner.
name: Long Bread Pizza Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 onion, mushroom, ham or bacon, or filling of your choice, chopped
1 pkt Woolworths crusty jumbo long bread rolls
1 tsp bbq smoky herb and spices, cayenne pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Meanwhile slice bread in half, spread tomato sauce or pizza sauce or bbq sauce of your choice. Spread a little mozzarella then onion, ham, mushroom, chopped tomatoes, topped it up with more mozzarella cheese. Sprinkle with smoky bbq herb and spices and a little cayenne pepper to add zing.
Put in the oven for 5-8 min. or until it is cooked thru but not burn the bread. Cool a couple mins before indulging so as not to burn your mouth and tongue. Enjoy!
